PH, MCD, HUBB, EL, DHI, CREE, LL, PAG, ZBRA, BZH, BLDP, FNKO, SOLO, GWPH, GIS, LGIH, KHC, CAG, BLL, XLB, PROG, FSLR, CTB, API, F, SYF, MET.
As always, we will update new trades and adjustments in Telegram.  Good trading all !
